env.name: IP

env.name: PASSWORD

env.description: Time zone for this app (format: Europe/Zurich)
env.label: Time zone
env.name: TZ

name: wapps_dns

note: After deploying this app, you need to create a new user via the containerâ€™s command line. Log in to your Portainer instance and select the container wapps_ipam_netbox_1. Connect to the container's console, execute the following command and fill in the required pieces of info (username, email address and password): python3 manage.py createsuperuser
